Uses of Class
tcore.Composer

Packages that use Composer 
Package Description
rules  

  • Uses of Composer in rules

    Subclasses of Composer in rules 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  ARule
    Applies the transformation on a single match.
    class  BasicRule  
    class  BRule
    Selects a branch in which the matcher succeeds.
    class  BSRule
    Selects a branch in which the matcher succeeds, as long as matches can be found.
    class  FRule
    Applies the transformation on all matches found.
    class  LQSRule
    Applies an inner rule for each match of the LHS as long as matches can be found.
    class  LRule
    Applies an inner rule for each match of the LHS.
    class  LSRule
    Applies an inner rule for each application of the outer rule as long as matches can be found.
    class  QRule
    Finds a match for the LHS.
    class  Sequence
    Applies each rule in the order provided.
    class  SRule
    Applies the transformation as long as matches can be found.
    class  XFRule
    Applies the transformation on all matches found with roll-back capability.
    class  XRule
    Applies the transformation on one match with roll-back capability.
    class  XSRule
    Applies the transformation as long as matches can be found with roll-back capability.

    static @NotNull LRule RuleFactory.createLRule​(java.lang.String name, Composer innerRule, Pattern preConditionPattern, java.util.ArrayList<Pattern> nacs)
    Create a LRule.
    Method parameters in rules with type arguments of type Composer 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static @NotNull Sequence RuleFactory.createSequence​(java.lang.String name, java.util.ArrayList<Composer> rules)
    Create a Sequence.

    Constructor Description

    LSRule​(java.lang.String name, Composer innerRule, LHS lhs)
